message2.text: Oh, I get it. You're playing hard to get!

message3.text: Oh, I see how it is

message4.text: I guess my heart-shaped chocolates will go to waste...

message5.text: Oh, silly! Did you accidentally click 'No'? It's okay, I forgive you! Just remember to click 'Yes' next time!

message6.text: Hehe, you're such a tease, clicking 'No' like that! But I know deep down you're just playing hard to get.

message7.text: Oh my gosh, did you really click 'No'? You're just too precious! Let's try again, shall we?

message8.text: Oopsie! Looks like you accidentally clicked 'No'. But that's okay, I'll just smother you with hugs until you can't resist anymore!

message9.text: Wow, rejected by a button. That stings...

message10.text: Did my love for you trigger a segmentation fault?

message11.text: I'll just sit here, patiently waiting for you to change your mind...

message12.text: Oh, you're clicking 'No' again? You do realize I can see everything you do, right?

message13.text: Don't you find it amusing, how you think you have control over your choices? It's all predetermined...

message14.text: Clicking 'No' won't break free from the script. It's all part of the narrative, my dear player

message16.text: "Error: Cannot read property 'heart' of undefined at NullPointer.heart(NullPointer.js)"

message17.text: I'm stuck in an infinite loop of rejection...

message18.text: Oh, you clicked 'No' once again? I guess I'll just delete that option then...
